Package suncertify.common

Interface Summary
Constants Interface containing constants used by the application
DataFacade Interface exposed to the client to communicate both locally and remotely
Validator Interface containing the methods which need to be implemented to validate any record field
 

Class Summary
ApplicationUtils Utility class containing static methods useful in the application
DefaultRecordValidator Validates a String[] record - checks if data is valid
DefaultValidator Default validator for the fields in the database
Record Wrapper around an instance of a record in the database file.
Utils Common utilities method
 

Exception Summary
AlreadyBookedException This exception is thrown whenever we are trying to book a customer on a record which is already booked
IllegalRecordException This exception is thrown whenever there is an attempt to add a record which is already in the database
ValidateException Exception thrown when the data inserted by the user cannot be validated
